title: Extend rate limiting to mutation endpoints
Kanban board view
description: Add a kanban-style board view with columns for open/in_progress/closed status.

title: Set up test infrastructure for abacus
Add per-issue stars
description: First column, sortable, interactive (click a star outline to star the issue, and that sets it as starred), filterable like open/closed/etc.

title: Add Subresource Integrity (SRI) for external assets
description: If any CDN assets are used, they should have integrity checks. Currently appears self-hosted so low priority, but document and enforce for future external resources.

title: Add input validation for issues and repos
Dashboard with charts and stats
description: Add a dashboard showing issue statistics, burndown charts, and project health metrics.

title: Add tests for easy-to-add areas
Throttle/group email notifications for issue changes
description: Batch multiple issue changes into a single email notification instead of sending one email per change. Group changes by time window and/or by user to avoid spamming inboxes when many issues change at once.

title: Fix webhook signature timing attack vulnerability
Add HSTS (Strict-Transport-Security) header
description: HSTS header not set. Add Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains to prevent MITM on first visit. Consider HSTS preload submission.

title: Add CSRF protection to state-changing endpoints
description: POST/PUT/DELETE endpoints lack CSRF tokens. While SameSite=Lax provides some protection, implement double-submit cookie pattern or synchronizer tokens for defense-in-depth.

title: Add sensitive field redaction to action logs
Webhook ownership flow with provisional secrets
description:
Implement webhook ownership model:
- repos table gets webhook_owner_id (FK to users, nullable)
- Provisional secrets stored separately during configure flow
- User clicks 'Configure Webhook' → gets provisional secret, shown setup instructions
- User clicks 'Test & Confirm' → we verify webhook works, promote to confirmed secret, set user as owner
- Only owner can see/manage secret; others can use repo but not see secret
- Owner can 'Delete Webhook' to clear secret/owner, making it available for others to claim
- Removing repo from profile doesn't affect ownership; re-adding restores access

title: @mentions in issue descriptions
description: Support @username mentions in descriptions that notify the mentioned user.

title: Add IssueList.tsx component tests
Add audit logging for admin actions
Loading skeletons instead of text
description: Replace 'Loading...' text with skeleton loading animations for better perceived performance.

title: Fix CORS credentials handling in middleware - HIGH
description: The CORS handler in functions/api/_middleware.ts:202-218 doesn't properly handle credentials. Either explicitly deny credentials or configure strict origin allowlist.

title: User profile screen
description: Users should have their own profile screen where they can remove repos (and add them there too if they want)

title: Improve mobile responsive design
description: Improve the UI for mobile devices - better touch targets, responsive tables, hamburger menu.

title: Review and sanitize error messages for production
description: Multiple files log potentially sensitive data to console and return detailed errors to clients. Implement structured logging with log levels and return generic errors to clients.

title: HTML-encode user content in notification emails
description: Issue titles in functions/api/webhooks/github.ts:66-83 are inserted into email HTML without encoding. Add htmlEncode() to prevent potential HTML injection in email clients.

title: Epic/parent-child tree view
description: Visualize issue hierarchy with epics and their child issues in a tree structure.

title: Per-repo webhook secrets
description: Change webhook authentication from single global secret to per-repo secrets stored in the database (plain text). Generate unique secret when user adds a repo, display it once for them to configure in GitHub. Verify incoming webhooks against the stored secret for that repo.

title: Invalidate sessions when user is deleted
Add issue ID validation on update/delete endpoints
description: The issueId from URL params in functions/api/repos/[owner]/[repo]/issues/[id].ts isn't validated with validateIssueId() before use. Add validation to prevent malformed IDs.

title: Email notifications for issue changes via GitHub webhooks
description:
Implement email notifications when beads issues change in tracked repos.

## Approach
Use GitHub webhooks to detect changes to .beads/ files:
1. Add webhook endpoint at /api/webhooks/github
2. Parse push events, check if .beads/issues.jsonl changed
3. Diff old vs new issues to detect what changed (status, assignee, etc.)
4. Send email notifications via Resend/SendGrid/Mailgun
5. Update README.md with instructions for repo owners to set up webhooks

## Requirements
- Store user emails (add user:email scope to GitHub OAuth)
- Webhook endpoint must verify GitHub signature (X-Hub-Signature-256)
- README section: how repo owners add webhook pointing to the app

## User profile settings
- Users can configure their email address in profile
- Users can enable/disable issue email notifications
- (Future: granular preferences - what events to notify on)

## Who gets notified
- Assignee on assignment/status changes
- Issue creator on status changes
- (Future: watchers/subscribers)

title: Add guest user level for new signups
description: testing a change

title: Improve empty states
description: Make empty states more helpful with guidance on what to do next and illustrations.

title: Fix browser back button navigation
description: App uses React state for navigation (view, selectedIssue, selectedRepo) but never updates browser URL/history. Back button navigates away from app instead of within it. Fix by syncing state with History API: push state on view changes, listen for popstate, encode state in URL paths/params.

title: Fix CORS wildcard configuration - HIGH
description: The default cors() middleware in src/server/app.ts:52 allows all origins. This permits any website to make authenticated requests. Fix by configuring explicit origin allowlist.

title: Add Premium users
description: Higher tier than user, lower than admin.

title: Show issue descriptions on hover/expand
description: In the issue list, show truncated descriptions on hover or with an expand button.

title: Add Content Security Policy (CSP) header
description: No CSP header is set. Add defense-in-depth against XSS: Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'

title: Bulk actions on issues
description: Allow selecting multiple issues and performing bulk actions: close, change status, change priority.

title: Keyboard shortcuts for power users
description: Add keyboard shortcuts: j/k for navigation, e to edit, s to star, / to search, ? for help.

title: Add HMAC-signed session tokens
Improve issue ID generation security
description: Issue ID generation in functions/api/repos/[owner]/[repo]/issues/index.ts:562-569 uses Math.random() with only 46,656 possible IDs. Replace with crypto.getRandomValues() and longer hash.

title: Link issues to GitHub PRs and commits
description: Allow linking issues to GitHub pull requests and commits for traceability.

title: Add consistent Retry-After header on rate limit responses
description: The unified Hono app in src/server/app.ts:73 returns 429 without Retry-After header, while Cloudflare middleware includes it. Make consistent across both.

title: Add tests for high-priority untested areas
description: Add tests for: Dashboard.tsx, IssueForm.tsx, ActivityFeed.tsx, MentionText.tsx, KVSessionStore.ts, action-log.ts

title: Add permission/authorization tests
description: Create tests to verify role-based access control: admin-only endpoints, premium features, guest restrictions, and anonymous access

title: Persist admin audit logs to database
description: The auditLog() function in functions/api/admin/users/[id].ts only writes to console.log which is ephemeral. Modify to also write to the action_log table for persistent audit trail of admin actions (role changes, user deletions).

title: Refactor repos to global table with user_repos join
description: Current design has per-user repos with per-user webhook secrets, but webhooks are per-repo. Refactor to: repos table (id, owner, name, webhook_secret) as global, user_repos (user_id, repo_id) as join table. Can drop existing repo data.

title: Add Secure flag to session cookie
Admin interface for webhook management
description: Add admin UI to view/modify webhook ownership on repos. Admins should be able to: revoke webhook (clear secret and owner), change webhook owner to a different user, view which repos have webhooks configured.

title: Add user allowlist/invite system for private access
Add SSRF protection to executor webhook dispatch
Issue comments
description: Add ability to comment on issues without editing them. Enables discussion and collaboration.

comments.author: binde
comments.text: Postponed: beads comments are local-only (stored in SQLite, not synced via JSONL). Cannot implement in Abacus without drifting from beads. Will revisit when beads adds comment sync to JSONL.

title: Add comment text length validation server-side
description: Comment text in functions/api/repos/[owner]/[repo]/issues/[id]/comments.ts only checks for empty, not max length. Use validateCommentText() from validation library to prevent abuse.

title: Add repo access authorization check
Activity feed / recent changes
description: Show a feed of recent changes across issues - who changed what and when.

title: Issue search/filter by text
description: Add ability to search and filter issues by text content. Hard to find issues in large repos without this.

title: Sanitize error messages to prevent info leakage
Add rate limiting on OAuth endpoints
Add tests for critical untested areas (middleware, auth, database, components)
Add explicit CORS configuration
